name: Forest Firestick's Maze of Doom
description:
Step into the shadows of the hellish maze as you enter the most chilling chapter of Forest Firestick's legacy. The only question you should have is:

Can you make it out alive?

Forest Firestick's maze of doom is a sequel to Forest Escape and Forest Escape: Halloween Edition

This is a far less challenging game, but it still requires quite a bit of patience.

The only difference with controls in this game is that you can duck with S and perform a super-jump if you hold down W and then press space.

Merry Christmas from Nithriotto Games! :D

Originally released 24th December 2018 on Gamejolt.
